settings: {"aggregation_type":"Sum","auto_set_height":true,"color.categorical_palette":["#11A579","#CC503E","#3969AC","#F2B701","#7F3C8D","#80BA5A","#E68310","#CF1C90","#008695","#F97B72","#4B4B8F","#A5AA99"],"hierarchy_layout":"circlePacking","label_case":"bottomUpperCase","label_padding":0.2,"label_weight":"allNormal","layout.footer_note":"資料來源：政府統計處，港鐵、九巴等營運資料","layout.footer_note_secondary":"註：零售銷貨額（今年5月數字）中的「食品煙酒等」不包括超級市場銷貨額；食肆收益為今年3月數宇；地鐵及九巴車費收益為2020年平均每月數字。","layout.header_logo_enabled":true,"layout.header_logo_height":4.5,"layout.header_logo_src":"https://public.flourish.studio/uploads/84ae9a57-257a-4c9b-b028-31d9cc698ed1.png","layout.subtitle":"*假設360億元消費券全數流入市場，每月平均約60億元，將分散流向零售、食肆、交通等範疇，振興效果或有限。（點擊項目可查看詳細數字）","layout.title":"本港每月零售食肆等收益 VS 消費券每月流入市場總額","layout.title_size":"2","layout.title_styling":true,"min_label_size":0.25,"multi_line_labels":true,"number_formatter.suffix":"億元","num_of_visible_levels":2,"stroke_color":null}
